VIII.iv.4.B.3.a
.
SMC Under PL 73-2
PL 73-2
, effective July 1, 1933, provided for the payment of SMC under
38 U.S.C. 1114(l)
for
the anatomical L/LOU of
both hands or both feet, or
one hand and one foot, or
being so helpless as to be in need of regular aid and attendance (A&A).
Note
:  Since
PL 73-2
did not provide for the payment of intermediate levels of SMC, the level of L/LOU had no effect on the level of SMC payable.
Example
:  Amputation of one arm above the elbow and amputation below the elbow of the other arm would establish entitlement to SMC under
38 U.S.C. 1114(l)
.
